transcend.4_1:
ATK DEF HP +16%
+5% Ally Team Attack
+1 Chain Passive Weakness Gauge damage
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%
+5% Ally Team Attack
+25 Action Points at battle start

SKT_FIRST.name: Playing with Fire
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy, and increases Priority of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>.

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Together as One guaranteed activation\n+1 turn debuff duration

description: Attacks an enemy, and increases Priority of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000081_1_1]</color>.

SKT_SECOND.name: Together as One
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: (Triggered Effect) When an ally <color=#28d9ed>Mage</color> attacks, activates an additional attack on the enemy with the highest Attack. After attacking, increases Priority of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>25%</color>, and grants <color=#28d9ed>25</color> Action Points to ally <color=#28d9ed>Mages</color> and <color=#28d9ed>Rangers</color>.
description: (Triggered Effect) When an ally <color=#28d9ed>Mage</color> attacks, activates an additional attack on the enemy with the highest Attack. After attacking, increases Priority of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000081_2_2]</color>, and grants <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000081_2_3]</color> Action Points to ally <color=#28d9ed>Mages</color> and <color=#28d9ed>Rangers</color>.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Little Sister Attack!
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies, and inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>. (Applied 2 times)\nAfter attacking, grants increased <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> and <color=#28d9ed>Penetration</color> to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
description: Attacks all enemies, and inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000081_3_1] turn(s)</color>. (Applied 2 times)\nAfter attacking, grants increased <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> and <color=#28d9ed>Penetration</color> to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000081_3_2] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to grant increased Attack to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, increases Priority of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000081_chain_1_1]</color> chance to grant increased Attack to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000081_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, increases Priority of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000081_backup_1_1]</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
